document.docAuthor: XUE, XIAO-FENG, GUO, JING-FENG & HONG, XIAO-YUE
document.masterDocTitle: Eriophyoid mites from Northeast China (Acari: Eriophyoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Eriophyoid mites from Northeast China (Acari: Eriophyoidea)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Aculus tetanothrix ( Nalepa, 1889 )
;
Skoracka et al . 2005: 113–114
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined. 4 females and 3 males (slide number NJAUAcariEriH39-1), from
Salix sp.
( Salicaceae ), Yichun City, Heilongjiang Province , P. R . China , 47°43'36''N , 128°55'12''E , elevation 234m , 25 July 2008 , coll. Xiao-Feng Xue, Zhen Wang & Zi-Wei Song; 5 females (slide number NJAUAcariEriJ1), from
Salix sp.
( Salicaceae ), Baicheng City, Jilin Province , P. R . China , 16 July 2008 , coll. Xiao-Feng Xue, Zhen Wang & Zi-Wei Song; 6 females (slide number NJAUAcariEri562), from
Salix sp.
( Salicaceae ), Changbai Mountain, Jilin Province , P. R . China , 42°02'27''N , 128°03'30''E , elevation 1892m , 25 June 2006 , coll. Xiao-Feng Xue & Zi-Wei Song; 6 females (slide number NJAUAcariEri597), from
Salix sp.
( Salicaceae ), Changbai Mountain, Jilin

Hosts.
Salix acutifolia Willd.
,
Salix alba
L.,
Salix amygdalina
L.,
Salix appendiculata Vill.
,
Salix arbuscula
L.,
Salix aurita
L.,
Salix aurita
L. x-myrtilloides Wimmer,
Salix caprea
L.,
Salix cinerea
L.,
Salix discolor
L.,
Salix eleagnos Scop.
,
Salix glauca
L.,
Salix grandifolia Ser.
,
Salix groenlandica
L.,
Salix hastata Wahlenb.
,
Salix herbacea
L,
Salix incana Schrank
,
Salix lanata
L.,
Salix lapponica
L.,
Salix lapponum
L.,
Salix livida Wahlenb.
,
Salix myrsinites
L.,
Salix myrtilloides
L.,
Salix nigricans Smith
,
Salix pentandra
L.,
Salix phycifolia
(L.) Smith,
Salix purpurea
L.,
Salix retusa
L.,
Salix rosmarinifolia
L.,
Salix rotundifolia Trautv.
,
Salix sp.
,
Salix starkeana Willd.
,
Salix viminalis
L.,
Salix viridis Fries.
( Salicaceae ).
Distribution. China ( Gansu , Hebei , Heilongjiang , Jiangsu , Jilin , Shaanxi , Tibet , Xinjiang ), Europe, East Palearctic, Near East, Nearctic region, Oriental region.

Note. This species occurred together with
Aculops salixis Xue, Song & Hong, 2007
. This is probably another species complex that is composed of several very similar species.
